title: Digital Content Portfolio
text:
I am a Digital Content Designer with a background in International Relations, currently transitioning my career toward digital content and instructional design.
I combine creative storytelling with cutting-edge AI technology to develop content that is not only visually engaging but also strategically aligned with global business goals.

title: Portfolio created by Anna Zambo
section: Project 1: Stress Management in the Modern Workplace Concept

Project 1: Stress Management in the Modern Workplace Concept

An AI-powered microlearning module designed to enhance employee wellbeing through scalable digital content. Tools Used: HeyGen (AI Avatar & Voice Synthesis), Adobe Creative Suite, and ChatGPT for instructional design. Key Objective: To demonstrate how AI-driven video production can reduce development time while maintaining high engagement and a human-centric feel for global teams.

title: Project 01: Stress Management
text:
Concept & Strategy
Stress Management in the Modern Workplace
An AI-powered microlearning module designed to enhance employee wellbeing through scalable digital content.

Technical Profile

Tools Used: HeyGen (AI Avatar & Voice Synthesis), Adobe Creative Suite (Visual Assets), and ChatGPT for instructional design.
Key Objective: To demonstrate how AI-driven video production can reduce development time while maintaining high engagement and a human-centric feel for global teams.

title: Digital Content Portfolio
text:
The Deliverable

Video


By integrating AI synthesis, I addressed the need for rapid content scalability. This workflow ensures that learning materials can be updated or localized instantly, which is a critical requirement for global medicine teams operating in an Agile environment.

title: Digital Content Portfolio
text:
UX-Driven Content Design
World Happiness Rankings 2024 – Interactive Visualization
I designed and developed an interactive world map in Tableau to visualize global happiness trends. The map uses a sophisticated color gradient where dark blue represents higher happiness scores, providing an immediate visual overview of global patterns.

Note: This project is for portfolio purposes only and is based entirely on publicly available data from the World Happiness Report 2024. No personal or sensitive information is used.

title: Digital Content Portfolio
text:
Strategic UX Features



Information Hierarchy
Structured into interactive points to prevent overwhelming the user, allowing for step-by-step exploration.


User-Centered Navigation
Dynamic filters for 7 contributing factors (e.g., Health, GDP, Social Support) to reduce cognitive load.




Accessibility & Inclusivity
Designed with high contrast, clear labels, and keyboard navigation in mind for an inclusive experience.


Scalability
Modular structure easy to localize and update across global learning platforms (LMS/LxP).

title: Digital Content Portfolio
text:
The Interactive Map

Interactive Dashboard Preview



Business Impact
By connecting visual storytelling with structured data, this design improves knowledge retention and active engagement. It demonstrates how complex organizational data can be communicated effectively to a global audience.

title: Digital Content Portfolio
text:
PROJECT 2
Interactive World Happiness Map (2024)
I developed an interactive world map in Tableau to visualize global happiness rankings. The core focus was to transform complex data into an intuitive, user-centered experience that allows for deep exploration without cognitive overload.

Note: This project is for portfolio purposes only, based on publicly available data from the World Happiness Report 2024.

title: Digital Content Portfolio
text:
The Interactive Experience
Users can explore seven contributing factors—including Health, Social Support, and GDP per Capita—through dynamic filters. Hovering over a country reveals exact scores, enabling an interactive, user-centered exploration of complex relationships.






Dynamic Data Exploration Interface

title: Digital Content Portfolio
text:
UX Design Principles Applied



Clear Information Hierarchy
Structured into clickable points, allowing users to explore step-by-step instead of being overwhelmed by text blocks.


User-Centered Navigation
Intuitive visual interactions that significantly reduce cognitive load and improve data digestion.


Global Scalability
A modular structure designed for easy localization and expansion across global learning platforms (LMS / LxP).




Engagement & Retention
Interactive hotspots encourage active exploration, increasing attention and knowledge retention compared to static content.


Accessibility-Aware Design
Designed with clear labels, high contrast, and keyboard navigation to support inclusive learning experiences.


Strategic Alignment
The map connects visual storytelling with structured information delivery to meet specific communication goals.
